reuters.title: W.GERMAN COCOA GRIND UP 2.9 PCT IN FIRST QUARTER
reuters.body: The West German cocoa grind rose 2.9 pct to 55,190 tonnes in the first quarter of 1987 from 53,643 tonnes in the same quarter of of 1986, the Bonn-based Confectionery Industry Association said in a statement. REUTER TAW 
